snippet: A maker of compounded drugs will begin selling $1 doses of Daraprim, whose price recently was increased to $750 per pill by Turing Pharmaceuticals.
abstract: Imprimis Pharmaceuticals will sell $1 doses of Daraprime, whose price was raised to $750 per pill by Turing Pharmaceuticals.
lead_paragraph: A maker of compounded drugs will begin selling $1 doses of Daraprim, whose price recently was increased to $750 per pill by Turing Pharmaceuticals.

headline.print_headline: Drug Compounder Offers $1 Alternative To $750 Pill
headline.main: Drug Compounder Offers $1 Alternative to $750 Pill
